shortdesc.ph: Used to obtain audio spectrum data.

plentry.pd: Audio spectrum data. Agora divides the audio frequency into 256 bands and reports the energy value of each band through this parameter. Each energy value ranges from [-300, 1], in dBFS.
The length of the audio spectrum data is 256.
Audio spectrum data. Agora divides the audio frequency into 256 frequency bands and reports the energy value of each band through this parameter. Each energy value ranges from [-300, 1], in dBFS.
Length of the audio spectrum data, fixed at 256.
